src:
Persiapan E-Sport, Kaesang Main Game Delapan Jam Per Hari
03 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kaesang Pangarep mengatakan tengah mempersiapkan diri untuk mengikuti turnamen MPL E-Sport Mobile Legend. Diketahui Kaesang bergabung dengan tim esport Genflix Aerowolf pada Agustus lalu.
Kaesang menuturkan, untuk mempersiapkan diri menjadi bagian dari tim tersebut, ia rajin bermain game setiap harinya. "Main game 8 jam, sisanya tidur, " kata dia di M Bloc, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Anak bungsu Presiden Joko Widodo ini, ingin menunjukkan bahwa tetap dapat berbisnis walaupun banyak menghabiskan waktu dalam bermain game. Ia mengaku memiliki waktu untuk kedua aktifitas itu.
Menurut Kaesang, menjalani aktivitas yang padat memang melelahkan. Namun, menurutnya ketika menjalaninya dengan bahagia, tidak akan terasa. "Enggak capek karena happy," kata dia.
Kaesang hadir dalam talk show yang diselenggarakan oleh Senyawa+. Festival ini merupakan wadah kreator dari berbagai industri bertemu dan berkolaborasi untuk menciptakan inovasi baru.
Senyawa+ diselenggarakan di M Bloc, Jakarta selama dua hari dari tanggal 2-3 November 2019. Talkshow ini diselenggarakan di dua panggung, yaitu di Livehose dan Oeang Restaurant.
text:
E-Sport Preparation, Kaesang Play the Game Eight Hours a Day
03 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kaesang Pangarep said that he is preparing to take part in the MPL E-Sport Mobile Legend tournament. It is known that Kaesang joined the Genflix Aerowolf esport team last August.
Kaesang said, to prepare to be part of the team, he was diligent in playing games every day. "Play the game for 8 hours, the rest sleeps," he said at M Bloc, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
President Joko Widodo's youngest son, wants to show that he can still do business despite spending a lot of time playing games. He claimed to have time for both activities.
According to Kaesang, undergoing intense activities is indeed tiring. However, according to him when living it happily, it will not be felt. "I'm not tired because I'm happy," he said.
Kaesang was present at the talk show hosted by Sen compound +. This festival is a place for creators from various industries to meet and collaborate to create new innovations.
Compound + was held at M Bloc, Jakarta for two days from November 2-3, 2019. The talkshow was held on two stages, namely at Livehose and Oeang Restaurant.
